entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `Microsoft.Maui.Resizetizer.targets` breaks build on macOS #14279
  • [iOS] X and Y constraints ignored when width, height, X and Y constraints are all specified on RelativeLayout child. #14277
  • RoundRectangle StrokeShape produces a different result on iOS vs Android #14276
    Backlog
  • .net maui & ios #14273
  • "Authorization code" OAuth flow not supported by WebAuthenticator #14272
    Backlog
  • [iOS] Trimming / AOT issue after publish in .NET MAUI Blazor app #14271
  • PickMultipleAsync is not working on IOS .net 7 #14270
  • Compiler errors #14267
  • AdaptiveTrigger in style for multiple elements does not work #14259
    Backlog
  • Support DisplayAlert from PresentedViewController #14258
    Backlog
  • VerticalStackLayout inside Scrollview: Button at the bottom not clickable on IOS #14257
    Backlog

Closed

  • HorizontalStackLayout to use full width #14177
  • Debugging/Deployment in iOS with net7.0 is broken #13340
  • Border StrokeThickness decreases Height on Android #13011
    Backlog
  • Border.StrokeShape clips content on Android, not iOS #13388
    Backlog
  • Border does not occupy all the space in a grid cell #9081
    Backlog
  • Border control for image with rounded corners doesnt work on iOS #9952
    .NET 8 Planning
  • MAUI: border not clip image #12580
    Backlog
  • [MacCatalyst] Image clipping with border not working #10478
    Backlog
  • [Bug] Strange Border with StrokeThickness and Clipped Content #7521
    Backlog
  • Border Clipping Issue in [iOS & macOS] #10724
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Issue in Clipping Images in Border #6986
    .NET 8 Planning
  • MAUI templates should respect tabs/spaces preferences like other templates #13782
    Backlog
  • Remove solution files from maui templates #14033
  • Automatic font scaling does not work #14260
  • Style (BackgroundColor) is not reflect correctly when in release mode #14266
  • [iOS] Crash during Render after adding items to an ObservableCollection #10163
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Reinstate transform tests on iOS #13429
    Backlog
  • Selection Highlight offset by 5 pixels #6118
    Backlog
  • Move to the backlog - Transparency - community needs fixes to move to maui. #14255

PullRequests

Created

  • [ios] fix memory leak in `Button` #14280
  • [android] reduce Java interop for `ContentViewGroup` and `WrapperView` #14275
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.Browser from 1.4.0.4 to 1.5.0 #14264
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [Windows] Fix crash swapping MainPage #14262
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/navigation 🧭
  • [Windows] Allow to refresh the RefreshView using the mouse #14261
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-refreshview

Merged

  • Expose BlazorWebView.TryDispatchAsync() API for access to scoped services #13425
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • [ios] fix memory leak with `Page` + `Layout` #14108
    area/perf 🏎️
  • [iOS] Fix Border Content clipping issues #10964
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, platform/iOS 🍎
  • Make .NET MAUI (Blazor) templates project based #14215
    area/templates 📄
  • Move maybe null when attribute back to core #14269
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.AppCompat.AppCompatResources from 1.6.0.1 to 1.6.1 #14265
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [iOS] Update CollectionView layout when reloading data #14218
    area/collectionview 📃
  • Reenable ViewTransform unit tests for iOS #13642
    platform/iOS 🍎, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #14251
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Merge main into net8.0 #14246
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Add Pages VC View opposed to the handlers view #13510

Updated

  • Fix Switch Off Track Color - Fixes #10099 #10758
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-switch
  • Force menu rebuild when window is closed (#10702) #13709
    community ✨
  • Refactor keyboard focus code for .NET 8 #13824
    area/controls 🎮
  • Use Background as Fill, if Fill is null in Shapes #14216
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️
  • [Android] Changes to propagate touch event with Frame #14230
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-frame
  • [TEST] strong name net8 (test of #14080) #14245
    area/tooling ⚙️, do-not-merge
  • Add TitleView to VisualChildren list for Page/Shell #14006
    area/shell 🐢
  • Removal of the AppAction icon extension on Android #14235
  • Style specificity #13818
    area/Xaml </>
  • [Android & iOS] Fix focus issues with DatePicker and TimePicker #13321
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-datetimepicker
  • Add SwipeItems to LogicalChildren #13864
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-swipeview
  • [Android] Allow to update Entry Background (once established) #12227
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, area/controls 🎮
  • [Android] Fix CollectionView EmptyView #11763
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/collectionview 📃
  • [Windows] Changes in SwipeViewHandler #11229
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-swipeview
  • [Windows] Apply different brushes by state (Normal, PointerOver, etc) #10782
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/drawing ✏️
  • Make Windows FrameRenderer border measure area on resize #14174
    t/bug, control-frame
  • Implement touch interception for layouts on Android #13725
    area/layout 🔲
